marine_life.name: Jellyfish
marine_life.origin: All oceans, from surface to deep sea
marine_life.threats: Overfishing of predators, warming seas, habitat degradation

marine_life.name: Carp
marine_life.origin: Freshwater rivers and lakes in Europe and Asia
marine_life.threats: Invasive species competition, habitat destruction, water pollution

marine_life.name: Red Discus
marine_life.threats: Deforestation, water pollution, overfishing for the pet trade

marine_life.name: Bass
marine_life.origin: Freshwater lakes and rivers in North America

marine_life.name: Bull Trout
marine_life.origin: Cold, clear freshwater rivers in North America

marine_life.name: Titan Holefish
marine_life.threats: Deep-sea mining, ocean acidification, habitat disturbance

marine_life.name: Betta Fish
marine_life.origin: Rice paddies and shallow waters in Southeast Asia
marine_life.threats: Habitat loss, pollution, overharvesting for the pet trade

marine_life.name: Crown Jellyfish
marine_life.origin: Deep oceans globally, typically in midwater zones
marine_life.threats: Climate change, overfishing of predators, microplastic ingestion
